messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  2247 - Golf - Ned to Bob
messages.msgSnippet: Ned, That is so great. We really love playing, intend to keep at it, and it will be my chance at staying out of his way! Bill Murray recently bought a home up
messages.messageBody:
Ned,

That is so great. We really love playing, intend to keep at it, and it will
be my chance at staying out of his way!

Bill Murray recently bought a home up the road from a club I play at on
occasion (the Valley Center are of north San Diego). He's been known to drop
in, and I only wish I could be there when he does. I also love how some of
the pro's become annoyed at the pro/ams when he terrorizes the course (I
guess it's the anarchist in me).

I'm afraid I had to intervene ONCE at the DR, and that was when my son wanted
to take a running "slap-shot!" start at the ball -- Happy Gilmore style. I
told him that there is a protocol that we best observe if we want to be
allowed back.

Bob


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  2247 - Golf - Ned to Bob
messages.msgSnippet: Oops, I mean t Bill Murray s THREE brothers. Tuck
messages.messageBody:
Oops, I mean't Bill Murray's THREE brothers.

Tuck

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  2247 - Golf - Ned to Bob
messages.msgSnippet: ... Have you seen his new show The Sweet Spot on Comedy Central?? It s all about golf.  He and his 4 brothers (I didn t know those guys were Bill Murray s
messages.messageBody:
>
>
>Of course I know Gilmore and Caddy Shack, and Bill Murray is one of my
>favorite people that I don't know.
>

Have you seen his new show "The Sweet Spot" on Comedy Central??

It's all about golf. He and his 4 brothers (I didn't know those guys
were Bill Murray's brothers) go around and play famous golf courses, and
of course, have a blast doing it. It was hilarious, and golf generally
makes me fall asleep.

Tuck
